fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Learn someone's role or start a riot.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You may visit someone and learn their exact role. This ignores any framing or disguising effect.

> Once per game, at night you can choose to start a riot, lowering the amount of votes needed to execute someone the next day by 3. This can't go below 1.

> The game won't end if Anarchist can still win by voting out the last good faction member by starting a riot.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose **or** see a Town (Power) get executed (this can win while dead).
